pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 1, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 1, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a private audience with His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales.

Large Drawing Room
Rideau Hall

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Canada Day Noon Show on Parliament Hill. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario        

Note for media:

  • Pooled media coverage

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will host the Canada Day Evening Show.

Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario        

Note for media:

  • Pooled media coverage


Media Appearances

9:52 a.m. – A segment with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Kids.
11:30 a.m. – An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Global’s The West Block
11:48 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC
11:53 a.m. – A brief interview will be broadcast live on Radio-Canada
